sys_script_include.name: ICICI_IPRU_Rider_Validation

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_d4012c5d2b6ad210c692feb2f291bff6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_rptp_smartinte_0.ICICI_IPRU_Rider_Validation</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>ICICI_IPRU_Rider_Validation</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var ICICI_IPRU_Rider_Validation = Class.create();
ICICI_IPRU_Rider_Validation.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    type: 'ICICI_IPRU_Rider_Validation',
    validate: function(riderObj, variantSysId) {
        //var variantId = "VRN017";
        var gr = new GlideRecord("x_rptp_smartinte_0_integration_rider_per_variant");
        gr.addQuery("sys_id", variantSysId);
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next()) {
            if (parseInt(riderObj.term) > gr.u_max_pt) {
                riderObj.term = u_max_pt;
            }
			
			if(riderObj.name== "RD022")

			{ 
            if (parseInt(riderObj.sumAssured) > gr.u_max_sumassured) {
                riderObj.sumAssured = u_max_sumassured;
            }

			}
			if(riderObj.name== "RD021")
			{ 
            if (parseInt(riderObj.sumAssured) > gr.u_max_sumassured) {
                riderObj.sumAssured = u_max_sumassured;
            }
			
			}

        }
        return riderObj;
    }





};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sinchana.shridhar</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-12-17 06:52:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>d4012c5d2b6ad210c692feb2f291bff6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ICICI_IPRU_Rider_Validation</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SmartIntegration" source="x_rptp_smartinte_0">eeb170fcff218a1019a8ffda7c4fd91f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="SmartIntegration">eeb170fcff218a1019a8ffda7c4fd91f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d4012c5d2b6ad210c692feb2f291bff6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sinchana.shridhar</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-12-17 06:52:24</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
